headline: GE Vernova Declares Second Quarter 2026 Dividend
summary: CAMBRIDGE, Mass., February 17, 2026--GE Vernova (NYSE: GEV) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a $0.50 per share quarterly dividend. The quarterly dividend will be payable on April 14, 2026, to shareholders of record as of March 17, 2026.

summary: GE Vernova and Cameco are evergreen energy plays.
